kv1.9:0.4_0: The account of the Mindfulness Meditation
kv1.9:1.3_0: All things are the power of mindfulness meditation that is the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
kv1.9:10.4_0: “Mendicants, the four kinds of mindfulness meditation are the path to convergence. They are in order to purify sentient beings, to get past sorrow and crying, to make an end of pain and sadness, to end the cycle of suffering, and to realize extinguishment.”
kv1.9:11.10_0: The appearance of one part of the moon and the treasure.
kv1.9:11.11_0: When a Wheel-Turning Monarch appears these seven treasures appear.
kv1.9:11.4_0: “Mendicants, when a Wheel-Turning Monarch appears seven treasures appear.
kv1.9:11.6_0: The wheel, the elephant, the horse, the jewel, the woman, the treasurer, and the counselor.
kv1.9:12.17_0: The account of the mindfulness meditation on mindfulness meditation is finished.
kv1.9:12.1_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.
kv1.9:12.3_0: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
kv1.9:12.4_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears these seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.”
kv1.9:12.7_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the awakening factors of mindfulness of the Realized One,
kv1.9:2.7_0: mindfulness that is a power of the eye, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom. And they realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
kv1.9:2.7_1: Looking away in the aggregates, for recollection of the Buddha, the teaching, the Saṅgha, recollection of ethical conduct, Mindfulness of breathing, Recollection of the deities.

kv1.9:5.6_0: And weight all of them within that same teaching.

kv1.9:7.6_0: Does mind come up for the mind:
kv1.9:8.4_0: Do all sentient beings are established in love for sentient beings.
kv1.9:9.4_0: “Mendicants, those who don’t enjoy mindfulness of the body don’t enjoy the deathless.
kv1.9:9.5_0: Those who enjoy mindfulness of the body enjoy the deathless.”
kv1.9:9.8_0: All sentient beings develop mindfulness of the body and cultivate the deathless.
